channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK's Reeves talks trade with US's Bessent after stressing EU ties
item.description: British finance minister Rachel Reeves met U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Friday to discuss a trade deal, shortly after saying that improvin...

item.title: Yale classmates warn Trump Treasury Secretary Bessent he risks enabling descent 'into fascism'
item.description: A new letter to Scott Bessent accuses President Donald Trump of usurping the authority of Congress and U.S. courts since regaining the White House.

item.title: Federal authorities arrest two judges, in escalation of Trump immigration crackdown
item.description: Federal agents arrested Milwaukee Circuit Court Judge Hannah Dugan on obstruction charges, FBI Director Kash Patel said.

item.title: Kevin Warsh says the Fed is broken. He’s taking dead aim at Powell’s job.
Former Rep. George Santos sentenced to 87 months in New York federal fraud case
item.description: Santos was expelled from Congress after the Republican was charged with identity theft and submitting false campaign finance reports.

item.title: U.S. Education Dept investigates UC Berkeley's foreign funding disclosures

item.title: Stock-market bulls are cheering a rare technical signal. Here’s how it works.
U.S. stocks end higher with Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq all scoring weekly gains
